info.name: Booky.io dark theme
info.additionalInfo:
v1.0.4 - 14/11/2019
--------------------------
Darkened the deletion select boxes.

v1.0.3 - 04/11/2019
--------------------------
Whitened the loading circle when adding a new bookmark.

v1.0.2 - 04/08/2019
--------------------------
Painted white the separator border when moving a link.

v1.0.1 - 15/07/2019
--------------------------
Painted dark some missing white buttons.

v1.0.0 - 12/07/2019
--------------------------
Released first version (only tested for desktop)
